<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_generative_ai_config"><sys_generative_ai_config action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><additional_configurations>{"skill_config_id":"3126ccb08714ea10c8020fe4dabb35c4"}</additional_configurations><ai_suggested>false</ai_suggested><definition>1526ccb08714ea10c8020fe4dabb357b</definition><definition_table>sys_one_extend_capability_definition</definition_table><max_tokens>1000</max_tokens><min_word_count>-1</min_word_count><model>llm_generic</model><name>test prompt</name><parent/><prompt>Note to user: This is a sample prompt. Before running this prompt, please add a skill input of type "Record" and choose Incident table.
You are a customer service representative. Summarize the below incident in no more than 250 words. The summary should only contain two sections "Issue" and "Priority".
You are optionally given the following details from the incident: Incident SHORT_DESCRIPTION: {{incident.short_description}} Incident DESCRIPTION: {{incident.description}} Incident PRIORITY: {{incident.priority}}</prompt><prompt_template_role>user</prompt_template_role><request_tokens>15134</request_tokens><show_in_prompt_library>false</show_in_prompt_library><state>draft</state><sys_class_name>sys_generative_ai_config</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-04-24 13:16:00</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>934445e28701aa10c8020fe4dabb3544</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>1526ccb08714ea10c8020fe4dabb357b</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="NASK Release Notes Generator" source="x_snc_nask_relea_0">8f4344308714ea10c8020fe4dabb3509</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NASK Release Notes Generator">8f4344308714ea10c8020fe4dabb3509</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_generative_ai_config_934445e28701aa10c8020fe4dabb3544</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-04-24 13:18:36</sys_updated_on><temperature>0.2</temperature><version>1</version></sys_generative_ai_config></record_update>
